Public & Private Cloud Hosting, in South Africa, by South Africans

About Umbono

Truly South African Cloud Enablement Services

Cloud Hosting and Aggregator Services, including Enterprise Voice, with the world's largest Public Cloud Providers, or direct in our very own UmbonoCloud™ Data Centre environment

Contact Us

- Jonathan Swift

Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.

About Umbono

Truly South African Cloud Enablement Services

Umbono (‘oom-boh-nor’) is the isZulu word for Vision, an Idea or Imagination, and the isiXhosa word for “Something perceived in the mind” or “Seen in a Dream”.

Contact Us

Innovative Turnkey Cloud Solutions

High Performance Hosting in the Cloud

IaaS, PaaS, SaaS and CCaaS Computing at local & international Public Tier-III & IV Hosting Providers, or alternatively in the dedicated UmbonoCloud™ South African Data Centre at Teraco Data Centres

READ MORE

Cognitive Analytics in the Cloud

Take advantage of the massive advances in High Performance Computing by combining advanced AI and Machine Learning techniques with traditional data analytics & BI approaches

READ MORE

Customer Experience in the Cloud

Industry-leading Customer Engagement (CE) and Customer Experience (CX) solutions in secure, reliable and flexible Cloud Hosting environments, together with Enterprise Voice connectivity

READ MORE

Resource Optimisation in the Cloud

Solutions designed to enhance the efficiency & effectiveness of employees, and& processes are automated, reducing operational costs and manage employee performance

READ MORE

Intelligent Automation in the Cloud

Award-winning Conversational AI, Machine-Learning, Automation and Authentication Solutions using class-leading technologies such as IBM Watson, VBG, Google Duplex and Amazon Lex

READ MORE

Application Integration in the Cloud

One of our core Specialities, integrate multiple, disparate platforms and data sources to produce a single, frictionless & cohesive ecosystem, using best-of-breed solutions and services

READ MORE

2023

We have completely reimagined the Managed Services model in South Africa

Take advantage of next-generation cloud-based Managed Services, focused on the creation, launch, adoption and support of bespoke provisioning and support services, across your entire Infrastructure-, Platform- or Software-as-a-Service portolofio

Design

Stage One

The critical first step in any solution implementation, architectural, platform and solution design clearly defines what the ultimate outcome will be.

Planning

Stage Two

A Goal without a plan is just a Wish. Project Planning and Task Allocation is critical to the successful outcome in any implementation, be it simple or complex.

Integration

Stage Three

Consuming and integrating multiple disparate systems & services  into a single, seamless ecosystem, made that much easier in today's always-on, connected world.

Rollout

Final Stage

Using Agile™ Methodology, the frictionless rollout of any solution or project is effectively and efficiently managed by skilled and experienced resources.

Support

Ongoing

Customer-centric Maintenance and Support services, clearly defined by Master Agreements and SLAs, managed through a 24x7x365 Support Team.

Professional Services

Customer-centric Implementation and Professional Services to drive Operational Success

Application Development

Software, API & Application Development using best-of-breed technologies

Bot Development

TextBot, ChatBot & VoiceBot Development using AI/ML technologies

Systems Integration

Integration of multiple, disparate sources into a single, cohesive ecosystem

Business Consulting

Mapping Business Goals and Requirements to Technical Solutions

MORE INFO

"We thrive to make our Customers Heroes in the eyes of their Customers"

Award-winning Cloud Partners

Our Services and Solutions are driven by some amazing, cutting-edge technologies, institutions and partners.
